text: Gösta Grip (14 June 1904 – 26 March 1998) was a Swedish actor. Grip made his film debut in Gustav Edgren's Simon i Backabo in 1934, and came to participate in 30 film productions. == Selected filmography == * 1935: Under False Flag * 1939: Only One Night * 1940: Bashful Anton * 1940: Kiss Her! * 1942: Doctor Glas == External links == * https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0342497/ * https://www.dramaten.se/Medverkande/Rollboken/Person/2930/ * https://www.kinopoisk.ru/name/216818/ == References == Category:Swedish actors Category:1904 births Category:1998 deaths
title: Gösta Grip
